casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Robert Dondera BATTS. No. 371P99-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 6, 2007. Robert Dondera Batts, Pro Se. Robert Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, G. Dewey Hudson, District Attorney, for State.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 12th day of January 2007 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the Superior Court, Duplin County, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court of that County:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th day of December 2007."
